title: Radiant Vaale: Diamond-studded Gold Bangles - A Touch of Hyderabadi Elegance
materials: G-H Color). Features a signature Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: Slender and sophisticated bangle design featuring alternating geometric shapes meticulously studded with brilliant-cut diamonds. The design incorporates a modern aesthetic while retaining a traditional appeal. The secure clasp ensures a comfortable and confident wear.
colors: Warm gold tones with the dazzling brilliance of white diamonds. A classic and timeless combination that complements any attire.
occasions: and Varalakshmi Vratam. Also suitable for modern celebrations like engagements and anniversaries.
description: These Vaale represent the perfect blend of modern style and timeless elegance. Crafted with the highest quality 22K gold and sparkling diamonds, they are a testament to Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The slim design offers a comfortable fit and makes them ideal for stacking with other bangles. A valuable addition to your heirloom collection.
